entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
